SEARCH
Module flag4j
Package org.flag4j.arrays.backend

Interface DenseTensorMixin<T extends DenseTensorMixin<T,U>,U extends SparseTensorMixin<T,U>>

Type Parameters:
T - The equivalent dense tensor type.
U - The type of this sparse tensor.
All Known Subinterfaces:
DenseMatrixMixinOld<T,U,V,W,Y>, DenseVectorMixin<T,U,V,W,Y>
All Known Implementing Classes:
CMatrix, CTensor, CTensor64, CVector, DenseFieldMatrixBase, DenseFieldTensorBase, DenseFieldVectorBase, DensePrimitiveDoubleTensorBase, FieldMatrix, FieldTensor, FieldVector, Matrix, Tensor, Vector
public interface DenseTensorMixin<T extends DenseTensorMixin<T,U>,U extends SparseTensorMixin<T,U>>
This interface specifies methods which sparse tensors should implement.

    Description

    Computes the element-wise sum between two tensors and stores the result in this tensor.

    Computes the element-wise division between two tensors.

    Computes the element-wise division between two tensors and stores the result in this tensor.

    Computes the element-wise multiplication of two tensors and stores the result in this tensor.

      U toCoo()
      Converts this dense tensor to an equivalent sparse COO tensor.
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If this tensor and b do not have the same shape.

    • divEq

      void divEq(T b)
      Computes the element-wise division between two tensors and stores the result in this tensor.
      Parameters:
      b - The denominator tensor in the element-wise quotient.
      Throws:
      TensorShapeException - If this tensor and b's shape are not equal.

    • div

      T div(T b)
      Computes the element-wise division between two tensors.
      Parameters:
      b - The denominator tensor in the element-wise quotient.
      Returns:
      The element-wise quotient of this tensor and b.
      Throws:
      TensorShapeException - If this tensor and b's shape are not equal.

    • allClose

      default boolean allClose(T b)
      Checks if all entries of this tensor are close to the entries of b.
      Parameters:
      b - Tensor to compare this tensor to.
      Returns:
      True if b is the same shape as this tensor and all entries are 'close', i.e. elements x and y at the same positions in the two tensors respectively satisfy |x-y| <= (1E-05 + 1E-08*|y|). Otherwise, returns false.
      See Also:
      • allClose(DenseTensorMixin, double, double)

    • allClose

      boolean allClose(T b, double relTol, double absTol)
      Checks if all entries of this tensor are close to the entries of b.
      Parameters:
      b - Tensor to compare this tensor to.
      relTol - Relative tolerance.
      absTol - Absolute tolerance.
      Returns:
      True if b is the same shape as this tensor and all entries are 'close', i.e. elements x and y at the same positions in the two tensors respectively satisfy |x-y| <= (atol + rtol*|y|). Otherwise, returns false.
      See Also:
      • allClose(DenseTensorMixin)
